about_the_game:
Pre-purchase PGA TOUR 2K25 Standard Edition and receive the Extra Butter x adidas Pack, which includes actor, “pretty great golfer,” and now playable character Chris McDonald. Included are three stylish cosmetics—hat, jacket and shoes.*

Plus, with your pre-purchase, you’ll also get PGA TOUR 2K23 Standard Edition (digital) to play while you wait!**

REAL FEEL

Swing your swing and play your game with new EvoSwing mechanics—new shot types, ball flights, roll physics, and visual improvements.

MAJOR TOURNAMENTS HAVE ARRIVED

The U.S. Open Championship, The Open Championship, and the PGA Championship make their 2K Franchise debut.

MyCAREER AND MyPLAYER, YOUR WAY

Step into the most immersive MyCAREER yet. Dynamically simulate rounds, play through training and pre-tournament events. Be your authentic self in MyPLAYER with diverse customizations, a new Attributes Points system, upgraded Skill Trees, and an all-new Equipment Progression system.

SEASONS—BACK AND BETTER THAN EVER

Power increases for equipment progression, Ranked leaderboard resets, regular content updates + more. Progress at your own pace—play through past Seasons even when a new one is live.

GRAB A CLUB, GRAB A FRIEND

Robust multiplayer match types include Stroke Play, Match Play, or Scramble—online or local. Challenge friends wherever they play with cross-platform societies.

UNLEASH YOUR INNER COURSE ARCHITECT

Design your dream course with Course Designer! New tools, surfaces, objects, and more control with higher-res terrain. Show off your courses in all their natural beauty with an all-new camera system.

Unlimited golfing possibilities await! Reserve your tee time now.

*Pre-purchase bonus offer available through 27 February 2025. Pre-purchase PGA TOUR 2K25 Standard Edition and receive the Extra Butter x adidas Pack. Terms apply.

**Pre-purchase PGA TOUR 2K25 through 27 February 2025 and receive a digital copy of PGA TOUR 2K23 Standard Edition. Digital copy of PGA TOUR 2K23 will be automatically entitled and available to download within 24 hours following pre-purchase. PGA TOUR 2K23 must be downloaded to the platform account used to pre-order PGA TOUR 2K25 and is non-transferable. Offer not available to platform accounts that already own PGA TOUR 2K23 on the same platform. Canceled pre-purchase will result in removal of digital copy of PGA TOUR 2K23 from platform account. Terms apply.
detailed_description:
PGA TOUR 2K25 Legend Edition

Pre-purchase PGA TOUR 2K25 Legend Edition for up to 7 days of Advanced Access (from Feb 21, 2025) + PGA TOUR 2K23 Standard Edition!*

Get the Legend Edition to upgrade your play—and your look—with a staggering SIX extra content packs full of powerful upgrades, chic cosmetics, and a new playable character.

Legend Edition includes:

  • PGA TOUR 2K25

  • SUN DAY RED Pack: Red Polo, Black Hat, Black Pants and White Glove + Tiger’s TaylorMade Driver Qi10 LS

  • Malbon Bucket Ball Pack: 3 unique Malbon Balls

  • Member’s Pass: Clubhouse Pass Premium (Seasons 1-5), Clubhouse Gear Pack—one outfit per body type per season; Season 1 items available at launch

  • Birdie Pack: Titleist GT4 Driver, Titleist Pro V1 Ball, FootJoy Premiere Series - Field Shoes, Umbrella Hat

  • Starter Pack: 1 Evo Tool, 5 Level-Up Tokens, 5 Club Fittings, 3 Ball Fittings + 1800 VC

  • Extra Butter x adidas Pack: Playable Chris McDonald + Extra Butter x adidas cosmetic hat, jacket, and shoes

*Pre-purchase PGA TOUR 2K25 through 27 February 2025 and receive a digital copy of PGA TOUR 2K23 Standard Edition. Digital copy of PGA TOUR 2K23 will be automatically entitled and available to download within 24 hours following pre-purchase. PGA TOUR 2K23 must be downloaded to the platform account used to pre-purchase PGA TOUR 2K25 and is non-transferable. Offer not available to platform accounts that already own PGA TOUR 2K23 on the same platform. Canceled pre-purchase will result in removal of digital copy of PGA TOUR 2K23 from platform account. Terms apply.


PGA TOUR 2K25 Deluxe Edition

Pre-purchase PGA TOUR 2K25 Deluxe Edition to get up to 7 days of Advanced Access (from Feb. 21, 2025). You’ll also get PGA TOUR 2K23 Standard Edition to play while you wait!*

With PGA TOUR 2K25 Deluxe Edition, gain an edge in MyCAREER with additional Tokens, Fittings and an Evo Tool. Look your best with fresh cosmetics.

Full Deluxe Edition includes:

  • PGA TOUR 2K25

  • Birdie Pack: Titleist GT4 Driver, Titleist Pro V1 Ball, FootJoy Premiere Series - Field Shoes, and Umbrella Hat

  • Starter Pack: 1 Evo Tool, 5 Level-Up Tokens, 5 Club Fittings, 3 Ball Fittings, and 1800 VC

  • Extra Butter x adidas Pack: Chris McDonald playable character + Extra Butter x adidas cosmetic hat, jacket, and shoes

*Pre-purchase PGA TOUR 2K25 through 27 February 2025 and receive a digital copy of PGA TOUR 2K23 Standard Edition. Digital copy of PGA TOUR 2K23 will be automatically entitled and available to download within 24 hours following pre-purchase. PGA TOUR 2K23 must be downloaded to the platform account used to pre-purchase PGA TOUR 2K25 and is non-transferable. Offer not available to platform accounts that already own PGA TOUR 2K23 on the same platform. Canceled pre-purchase will result in removal of digital copy of PGA TOUR 2K23 from platform account. Terms apply.
